0: A serial killer dubbed the “Aachen Strangler” was found dead in his prison cell after electrocuting himself while engaging in “autoerotic actions,” police have said. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Egidius Schiffer, 62, who was sentenced to life in 2008 for murdering five female hitchhikers between 1983 and 1990, was still hooked up to live electricity when his cell was unlocked on Sunday morning. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR “He removed a cable from his bedside table lamp, then wound it around his nipples and his penis and stuck the end in a power socket,” said Candida Tunkel, a spokeswoman for Bochum prison.
